insert into Product_info (product_idx, product_info_amount, product_info_useMethod, product_info_maker, product_info_handphone ) values(#{product_idx}, #{product_info_amount}, #{product_info_useMethod}, #{product_info_maker}, #{product_info_handphone} )
mapper.select: select product_idx from `product` where product_name = #{product_name} AND member_nickname = #{member_nickname}

product_capa like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')

product_name = #{product_name},
